verses.verse: And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456> out of <WG1537> the temple <WG3485>, saying <WG3004> to the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32>, Go <WG5217> ye <WG2532>, and pour out <WG1632> the seven bowls <WG5357> of the wrath <WG2372> of God <WG2316> into <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> the first <WG4413> went <WG565>, and <WG2532> poured out <WG1632> his <WG846> bowl <WG5357> into <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>; and <WG2532> it became <WG1096> a noisome <WG2556> and <WG2532> grievous <WG4190> sore <WG1668> upon <WG1519> the men <WG444> that <WG3588> had <WG2192> the mark <WG5480> of the beast <WG2342>, and <WG2532> that worshipped <WG4352> his <WG846> image <WG1504>.

And <WG2532> the second1208, 32 poured out <WG1632> his <WG846> bowl <WG5357> into <WG1519> the sea <WG2281>; and <WG2532> it became <WG1096> blood <WG129> as <WG5613> of a dead <WG3498> man <WG2532>; and every <WG3956> living <WG2198> soul <WG5590> died <WG599>, even the things that were in <WG1722> the sea <WG2281>.

And <WG2532> the third5154, 32 poured out <WG1632> his <WG846> bowl <WG5357> into <WG1519> the rivers <WG4215> and <WG2532> the <WG1519> fountains <WG4077> of the waters <WG5204>; and <WG2532> it became <WG1096> blood <WG129>.

And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> the angel <WG32> of the waters <WG5204> saying <WG3004>, Righteous <WG1342> art <WG1488> thou <WG5607>, who art and <WG2532> who wast <WG2258>, 2532, 3741 thou Holy One <WG2962>, because <WG3754> thou didst thus <WG5023> judge <WG2919>:

for <WG3754> they poured <WG1632> out the blood <WG129> of the saints <WG40> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396>, and <WG2532> blood <WG129> hast thou given <WG1325> them <WG846> to drink <WG4095>: <WG1063> they are <WG1526> worthy <WG514>.

And <WG2532> I heard191, 243 the <WG1537> altar <WG2379> saying <WG3004>, Yea <WG3483>, O Lord <WG2962> God <WG2316>, the Almighty <WG3841>, true <WG228> and <WG2532> righteous <WG1342> are thy <WG4675> judgments <WG2920>.

And <WG2532> the fourth5067, 32 poured out <WG1632> his <WG846> bowl <WG5357> upon <WG1909> the sun <WG2246>; and <WG2532> it <WG2739> was given <WG1325> unto it <WG846> to scorch <WG2739> men <WG444> with <WG1722> fire <WG4442>.

And <WG2532> men <WG444> were scorched <WG2739> with great <WG3173> heat <WG2738>: and <WG2532> they blasphemed <WG987> the name <WG3686> of God <WG2316> who <WG3588> hath <WG2192> the power <WG1849> over <WG1909> these <WG3778> plagues <WG4127>; and <WG2532> they repented <WG3340> not <WG3756> to give <WG1325> him <WG846> glory <WG1391>.

And <WG2532> the fifth3991, 32 poured out <WG1632> his <WG846> bowl <WG5357> upon <WG1909> the throne <WG2362> of the beast <WG2342>; and <WG2532> his <WG846> kingdom <WG932> was <WG1096> darkened <WG4656>; and <WG2532> they gnawed <WG3145> their <WG846> tongues <WG1100> for <WG1537> pain <WG4192>,

and <WG2532> they blasphemed <WG987> the God <WG2316> of heaven <WG3772> because <WG1537> of their <WG846> pains <WG4192> and <WG2532> their <WG846> sores <WG1537>; and <WG2532> they repented <WG3340> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> their <WG846> works <WG2041>.

And <WG2532> the sixth1623, 32 poured out <WG1632> his <WG846> bowl <WG5357> upon <WG1909> the great <WG3173> river <WG4215>, the river Euphrates <WG2166>; and <WG2532> the water <WG5204> thereof <WG846> was dried up <WG3583>, that <WG2443> the way <WG3598> might by made ready <WG2090> for the kings <WG935> that come from <WG575> the <WG2246> sunrising <WG395>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> coming out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> of the dragon <WG1404>, and <WG2532> out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> of the beast <WG2342>, and <WG2532> out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> of the false prophet <WG5578>, three <WG5140> unclean <WG169> spirits <WG4151>, as it were <WG3664> frogs <WG944>:

for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> spirits <WG4151> of demons <WG1142>, working <WG4160> signs <WG4592>; which go forth1607, 3739, Nehemiah7 unto <WG1909> the kings935, Genesis93, 2532 of the whole <WG3650> world <WG3625>, to gather <WG4863> them <WG846> together unto <WG1519> the war <WG4171> of the <WG1565> great <WG3173> day <WG2250> of God <WG2316>, the Almighty <WG3841>.

(Behold <WG2400>, I come <WG2064> as <WG5613> a thief <WG2812>. Blessed <WG3107> is he <WG3588> that watcheth <WG1127>, and <WG2532> keepeth <WG5083> his <WG846> garments <WG2440>, lest <WG3363> he walk <WG4043> naked <WG1131>, and <WG2532> they see <WG991> his <WG846> shame <WG808>.)
And <WG2532> they gathered <WG4863> them <WG846> together <WG4863> into <WG1519> the place <WG5117> which is called <WG2564> in Hebrew <WG1447> Har-Magedon <WG717>.

And <WG2532> the seventh1442, 32 poured out <WG1632> his <WG846> bowl <WG5357> upon <WG1519> the air <WG109>; and <WG2532> there came <WG1831> forth a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456> out <WG575> of the temple <WG3485>, <WG3772> from <WG575> the throne <WG2362>, saying <WG3004>, It is done <WG1096>:

and <WG2532> there were <WG1096> lightnings <WG796>, and <WG2532> voices <WG5456>, and <WG2532> thunders <WG1027>; and <WG2532> there was <WG1096> a great <WG3173> earthquake <WG4578>, such as <WG3634> was <WG1096> not <WG3756> since575, 3739 there were <WG1096> men <WG444> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>, so great <WG3173> an earthquake <WG4578>, so <WG3779> mighty <WG5082>.

And <WG2532> the great <WG3173> city <WG4172> was divided <WG1096> into <WG1519> three <WG5140> parts <WG3313>, and <WG2532> the cities <WG4172> of the nations <WG1484> fell <WG4098>: and <WG2532> Babylon <WG897> the great <WG3173> was remembered <WG3415> in the sight <WG1799> of God <WG2316>, to give <WG1325> unto her <WG846> the cup <WG4221> of the wine <WG3631> of the fierceness <WG2372> of his <WG846> wrath <WG3709>.
And <WG2532> every <WG3956> island <WG3520> fled away <WG5343>, and <WG2532> the mountains <WG3735> were <WG2147> not <WG3756> found <WG2147>.

And <WG2532> great <WG3173> hail <WG5464>, every stone about <WG5613> the weight of a talent <WG5006>, cometh down <WG2597> out of <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> upon <WG1909> men <WG444>: and <WG2532> men <WG444> blasphemed <WG987> God <WG2316> because of <WG1537> the plague <WG4127> of the hail <WG5464>; for <WG3754> the plague <WG4127> thereof <WG846> is <WG2076> exceeding <WG4970> great <WG3173>.
